TopicTitle: Nik Wallenda to walk across Grand Canyon Live Today

Articles.Content:
Nik Wallenda, a daredevil, is going to be walknig across the grand canyon on a 2 inch thick wire with no safety harness today. The place where he is walking across is 425 meters long and is 457 meters above the canyon floor. (going from information from the coverage)

It is being covered live on the Discovery Channel & their website. (is happening now)

edit: he is on the wire.

Edited June 24, 2013 by Rockhem
You just ruined my chance of going to school tomorrow.
Hah, coincidences. I was just watching that.
It's really windy, are they winding the wire back up?

It's really windy, are they winding the wire back up?

Nope, they are going ahead.
